/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -g   CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/buffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/ftse_env.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/encoding.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/token.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/database.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/postings.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/utils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/search.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ftse.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o ftse  -lsqlite3 -lexpat -lm
